fields.name: Sit up
fields.description: A core exercise where you lie on your back and raise your torso to a sitting position.

fields.name: Crunch cable
fields.description: A variation of the crunch performed on a cable machine to target the core.

fields.name: Crunch machine
fields.description: A machine that helps to perform crunches for abdominal strengthening.

fields.name: Decline crunch
fields.description: A crunch performed on a decline bench to intensify the movement.

fields.name: Leg raise
fields.description: An exercise to target the lower abdominals by lifting the legs while lying down.

fields.name: Ab-Wheel Rollout
fields.description: An exercise using an ab wheel to roll forward, targeting the core.

fields.name: Hanging knee raise
fields.description: A hanging exercise where you raise your knees to your chest, targeting the core.

fields.name: Hanging leg raise
fields.description: Similar to the knee raise but performed by raising the legs straight out, targeting the lower abs.

fields.name: Plank
fields.description: A core stabilization exercise where you hold your body in a straight line while resting on your forearms and toes.

fields.name: Side plank
fields.description: A variation of the plank where you lie on your side and support your body with one arm, targeting the obliques.

fields.name: Barbell row
fields.description: A compound exercise performed by pulling a barbell towards your torso, targeting the back muscles.

fields.name: Barbell Shrug
fields.description: A movement where you elevate your shoulders with a barbell, targeting the trapezius muscles.

fields.name: Chin up
fields.description: A pulling exercise where you lift your body using a chin-up bar, palms facing towards you.

fields.name: Deadlift
fields.description: A full-body compound exercise where you lift a barbell from the floor to the hips.

fields.name: Dumbbell row
fields.description: A unilateral exercise where you pull a dumbbell towards your torso while bending over, targeting the back.

fields.name: Face pulls
fields.description: A cable exercise targeting the upper back and rear deltoids by pulling the rope towards your face.

fields.name: Good morning
fields.description: A hip-hinge movement using a barbell to strengthen the posterior chain, primarily the hamstrings and lower back.

fields.name: Hammer strength row
fields.description: A machine-based rowing exercise designed to target the back muscles.

fields.name: Lat pulldown
fields.description: A machine exercise where you pull a bar down to your chest, targeting the latissimus dorsi muscles.

fields.name: Machine shrug
fields.description: A machine-based exercise to target the trapezius muscles by elevating the shoulders.

fields.name: Neutral chin up
fields.description: A variation of the chin-up with palms facing each other, targeting the biceps and back.

fields.name: Pendlay row
fields.description: A barbell rowing movement performed from the floor, emphasizing the explosive power of the back.

fields.name: Pull up
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise where you lift your body on a bar, palms facing away from you, primarily targeting the back.

fields.name: Rack pull
fields.description: A variation of the deadlift where you pull the bar from a rack at knee level, targeting the back and posterior chain.

fields.name: Seated cable row
fields.description: A machine exercise where you pull a cable towards your torso while sitting down, targeting the back.

fields.name: T-bar row
fields.description: A rowing exercise performed using a T-bar machine, targeting the back muscles.

fields.name: Barbell curl
fields.description: A classic bicep exercise where you curl a barbell upwards, targeting the biceps.

fields.name: Cable curl
fields.description: A bicep exercise performed on a cable machine, using a rope or bar attachment to curl the weight.

fields.name: Dumbbell curl
fields.description: A bicep exercise where you curl a dumbbell towards your shoulder, targeting the biceps.

fields.name: Dumbbell hammer curl
fields.description: A variation of the bicep curl using dumbbells, palms facing each other, targeting the brachialis and forearms.

fields.name: Dumbbell preacher curl
fields.description: A bicep curl performed on a preacher bench using dumbbells to isolate the biceps.

fields.name: EZ-bar curl
fields.description: A curl exercise performed using an EZ-bar to reduce stress on the wrists, targeting the biceps.

fields.name: EZ-bar preacher curl
fields.description: A preacher curl using an EZ-bar to focus on the biceps and minimize cheating during the lift.

fields.name: Seated incline dumbbell curl
fields.description: A bicep curl performed on an inclined bench using dumbbells, isolating the biceps with a full range of motion.

fields.name: Seated machine curl
fields.description: A bicep curl exercise performed on a machine, focusing on controlled movements and isolation of the biceps.

fields.name: Cycling
fields.description: A cardiovascular exercise performed on a stationary bike or outdoors, targeting the legs and cardiovascular system.

fields.name: Degrees
fields.description: A cardiovascular exercise on a machine with adjustable resistance, focusing on lower body endurance.

fields.name: Elliptical Trainer
fields.description: A low-impact cardiovascular machine that simulates running, focusing on both the upper and lower body.

fields.name: Rowing Machine
fields.description: A full-body cardiovascular exercise using a rowing machine, targeting the back, legs, and arms.

fields.name: Running (Outdoor)
fields.description: Running outdoors as a cardiovascular exercise, primarily engaging the legs and improving endurance.

fields.name: Running (Treadmill)
fields.description: Running on a treadmill, a cardiovascular exercise that targets the legs and improves cardiovascular endurance.

fields.name: Stationary bike
fields.description: Cycling on a stationary bike, a low-impact cardiovascular exercise targeting the legs.

fields.name: Swimming
fields.description: A full-body exercise performed in water, offering a low-impact cardiovascular workout.

fields.name: Walking
fields.description: A low-impact, weight-bearing exercise that promotes cardiovascular health and engages the legs.

fields.name: Cable crossover
fields.description: An exercise performed on a cable machine that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

fields.name: Decline barbell bench press
fields.description: A variation of the bench press performed on a decline bench, targeting the lower chest.

fields.name: Decline hammer strength chest press
fields.description: A machine-based chest press performed on a decline bench, targeting the lower chest.

fields.name: Flat barbell bench press
fields.description: A classic chest exercise performed on a flat bench, targeting the pectoral muscles.

fields.name: Flat dumbbell bench press
fields.description: A dumbbell variation of the bench press performed on a flat bench, targeting the chest muscles.

fields.name: Flat dumbbell fly
fields.description: A chest exercise performed with dumbbells on a flat bench, targeting the chest through a wide arc movement.

fields.name: Incline barbell bench press
fields.description: A bench press performed on an incline bench, targeting the upper portion of the chest.

fields.name: Incline dumbbell bench press
fields.description: An incline bench press performed with dumbbells, targeting the upper chest muscles.

fields.name: Incline dumbbell fly
fields.description: A chest fly performed on an incline bench using dumbbells, targeting the upper chest.

fields.name: Incline hammer strength chest press
fields.description: A machine-based chest press performed on an incline, targeting the upper chest muscles.

fields.name: Seated machine fly
fields.description: A machine exercise that isolates the chest muscles by performing a fly movement while seated.

fields.name: Smith machine bench press
fields.description: A bench press variation using a Smith machine for added stability, targeting the chest muscles.

fields.name: Smith machine incline bench press
fields.description: An incline bench press variation using a Smith machine to target the upper chest.

fields.name: Abduction machine
fields.description: A machine that targets the hip abductors by performing an outward leg movement, focusing on the outer thighs.

fields.name: Adduction machine
fields.description: A machine that targets the hip adductors by performing an inward leg movement, focusing on the inner thighs.

fields.name: Barbell calf raise
fields.description: A calf exercise performed by raising the body on a barbell resting on the shoulders, targeting the calves.

fields.name: Barbell front squat
fields.description: A squat variation with the barbell positioned in front of the body, primarily targeting the quads and core.

fields.name: Barbell glute bridge
fields.description: A glute exercise where the barbell is placed on the hips while performing a hip thrust, targeting the glutes and hamstrings.

fields.name: Barbell squat
fields.description: A compound movement with the barbell placed on the back, targeting the quads, glutes, hamstrings, and lower back.

fields.name: Calf press
fields.description: A calf exercise performed on a leg press machine, pushing weight with the toes to target the calves.

fields.name: Donkey calf raise
fields.description: A calf exercise performed while bent forward with a machine or partner applying resistance to the hips, focusing on the calves.

fields.name: Glute-ham raise
fields.description: An exercise performed on a glute-ham developer machine, targeting the hamstrings and glutes.

fields.name: Leg extension machine
fields.description: A machine exercise that targets the quadriceps by extending the legs against resistance.

fields.name: Leg press
fields.description: A machine exercise where the user pushes a weighted platform with their legs, targeting quads, hamstrings, and glutes.

fields.name: Lying leg curl machine
fields.description: A machine exercise that targets the hamstrings by curling the legs in a lying position.

fields.name: Romanian deadlift
fields.description: A variation of the deadlift, focusing on the hamstrings and glutes by lowering the barbell while keeping the legs straight.

fields.name: Seated calf raise machine
fields.description: A machine exercise targeting the calves, performed while seated with a weight on the knees and pushing with the toes.

fields.name: Seated leg curl machine
fields.description: A machine exercise that targets the hamstrings by curling the legs in a seated position.

fields.name: Standing calf raise machine
fields.description: A calf exercise performed while standing with weight on the shoulders, lifting the body with the calves.

fields.name: Stiff-legged deadlift
fields.description: A deadlift variation where the legs are kept straight to emphasize the hamstrings and lower back.

fields.name: Sumo deadlift
fields.description: A deadlift variation with a wider stance, focusing on the inner thighs, glutes, and lower back.

fields.name: Neck crunch
fields.description: An exercise that targets the muscles of the neck by flexing and extending the head against resistance.

fields.name: Neck cable
fields.description: An exercise using a cable machine to target the muscles of the neck by applying resistance in various directions.

fields.name: Arnold dumbbell press
fields.description: A shoulder exercise involving a rotating dumbbell press, targeting the deltoids from multiple angles.

fields.name: Behind the neck barbell press
fields.description: A barbell press performed behind the neck, targeting the shoulders, particularly the front and lateral deltoids.

fields.name: Cable face pulls
fields.description: An exercise using a cable machine to pull a rope attachment towards the face, targeting the rear deltoids and upper back.

fields.name: Front dumbbell raise
fields.description: A shoulder exercise performed by lifting a dumbbell in front of the body, focusing on the anterior deltoid.

fields.name: Hammer strength shoulder press
fields.description: A machine exercise that simulates the shoulder press movement, focusing on the deltoid muscles.

fields.name: Lateral dumbbell raise
fields.description: A shoulder exercise performed by raising a dumbbell to the side, targeting the lateral deltoids.

fields.name: Lateral machine raise
fields.description: A machine exercise targeting the lateral deltoid by lifting the arms to the side.

fields.name: Log press
fields.description: A shoulder press using a log-shaped barbell, focusing on shoulder and tricep strength.

fields.name: One-arm standing dumbbell press
fields.description: A shoulder press variation using one dumbbell at a time, performed while standing to engage the core.

fields.name: Overhead press
fields.description: A barbell or dumbbell press performed overhead, primarily targeting the deltoids and triceps.

fields.name: Push press
fields.description: A shoulder press variation that uses leg drive to help press the weight overhead, targeting the deltoids and triceps.

fields.name: Rear delt dumbbell raise
fields.description: A shoulder exercise targeting the rear deltoids by raising dumbbells to the side while bent forward.

fields.name: Rear delt machine fly
fields.description: A machine exercise targeting the rear deltoids, performed by pulling the handles outward while seated.

fields.name: Seated dumbbell lateral raise
fields.description: A variation of the lateral raise performed while seated, targeting the lateral deltoids.

fields.name: Seated dumbbell press
fields.description: A shoulder press performed while seated with dumbbells, targeting the deltoids and triceps.

fields.name: Smith machine overhead press
fields.description: An overhead press variation using the Smith machine, focusing on the shoulders and triceps.

fields.name: Cable overhead triceps extension
fields.description: An exercise performed on a cable machine, where the user extends the arms overhead to target the triceps.

fields.name: Close grip barbell bench press
fields.description: A bench press variation performed with a narrow grip, focusing more on the triceps than the chest.

fields.name: Dumbbell overhead triceps extension
fields.description: A triceps exercise performed with a dumbbell, where the weight is extended overhead and lowered behind the head.

fields.name: EZ-bar skullcrusher
fields.description: An exercise performed with an EZ-bar, where the arms are extended to target the triceps by lowering the bar towards the forehead.

fields.name: Lying triceps extension
fields.description: A triceps exercise performed lying on a bench, extending the arms with a barbell or dumbbells to target the triceps.

fields.name: Parallel bar triceps dip
fields.description: A bodyweight exercise performed on parallel bars, focusing on the triceps as the body is lowered and raised.

fields.name: Ring dip
fields.description: A triceps exercise performed using gymnastic rings, engaging the triceps, shoulders, and chest as the body is lowered and raised.

fields.name: Rope push down
fields.description: An exercise performed on a cable machine with a rope attachment, pushing the rope down to extend the triceps.

fields.name: Smith machine close grip bench press
fields.description: A close grip bench press variation performed using the Smith machine, targeting the triceps and chest.

fields.name: V-bar push down
fields.description: A triceps exercise performed on a cable machine with a V-bar attachment, pushing down to target the triceps.
